channel.title: More catholic homophobia
channel.description:
[size=14pt][b]Gay equality laws threatening last Roman Catholic adoption agency ‘will lead to harm to children in care’[/b][/size] [i]By Simon Caldwell Last updated at 5:30 PM on 28th February 2010[/i] Children in care will suffer if the last Roman Catholic adoption agency in England and Wales is forced to close down by gay equality laws, Church leaders warned today. Three Catholic bishops told worshippers that they were taking the case of the Catholic Care adoption agency to the High Court on Wednesday because they were fighting for the rights of vulnerable children to a loving family. They said that the closure of the adoption agency, which finds new homes for about 20 ‘difficult-to-place’ children each year, would represent the loss of an ‘effective and well-respected resource’. The agency, which serves the dioceses of Leeds, Middlesbrough and Hallam in South Yorkshire, is the only one of 11 Catholic adoption agencies in the country to continue to fight the Sexual Orientation Regulations (SORs). The law outlawed discrimination against gay couples in the provision of goods and services and was pushed through Parliament in 2007 in spite of protests from leaders of all the mainstream religious faiths. It meant that Catholics adoption agencies - which together found new homes for about 250 children in care each year - were obliged to assess same-sex couples as potential adopters or foster parents. The Catholic Church teaches that gay adoption is ‘gravely immoral’, however, and it has since either closed its adoption agencies or relinquished control of them, without a single agency surviving. But today Bishop Arthur Roche of Leeds, Bishop John Rawsthorne of Hallam and Bishop Terry Drainey of Middlesbrough vowed to fight to keep Catholic Care open in its present form. In a letter read out at Masses in hundreds of churches they said the Government was trying to force Catholic Care to operate ‘with disregard to the Church’s teaching on marriage and family life’ even though the agency had a record of placing ‘some of the most vulnerable children to the care of loving families in our region’. ‘Despite the fact that Catholic Care has been able to find caring families for a vast number of needy children we are being invited either to stop our adoption work or stop being a Catholic charity altogether,’ the bishops said. ‘Our position is that it is in the interests of children to continue our work. We are not judging other agencies that accept same sex couples for adoption, but feel strongly that we should not be forced to do so, nor is there a necessity for this to happen. 'We believe that this is a legally justifiable position.’ They said: ‘Our adoption service has been at the heart of the local community for over 100 years. ‘It has been praised and widely appreciated by local authorities and social services, as well as the children who have benefited from this work and the couples who have sought to adopt them. ‘Children have a right to a family life,’ they added. ‘There are too many children awaiting adoption and Catholic Care has a vital and a special role in helping very vulnerable children by finding loving families for them. ‘If Catholic Care is forced to close its adoption service it is children who will lose an effective and well-respected resource in the Yorkshire region.’ The High Court battles comes less than a year after the Charity Tribunal told Catholic Care that it could not continue as an adoption agency unless it accepted gay couples. The agency had earlier applied to the Charity Commission to change its charitable objects so that it could appeal for an exemption under Regulation 18 of the SORs. The regulation allows charities to practice limited discrimination in pursuing their objectives effectively. But the Charity Tribunal ruled that it would be unlawful to allow Regulation 18 to be used as a defence by Catholic Care, saying that the proposed alteration of the objects ‘arose substantially out a desire to maintain a principled stance rather than being specifically designed to advance the ... charitable purpose of the support, relief and care of children and young people without families to care for them’. The appeal to the High Court will be heard on the same day that the Catholic bishops of England and Wales publishe a pre-General Election document in which they say it is ‘essential’ for politicians to support marriage and the family. While the main political parties disagree on the importance of heterosexual marriage, with Labour arguing that it was simply a lifestyle choice, they share support for civil partnerships and gay adoption. Last month Tory frontbencher Nick Herbert, who is openly gay, said homosexuality may be ‘given by God’ and hinted that the Church was wrong to oppose gay marriage and gay adoption. ‘We should not seek to prevent adoption by same-sex couples who may offer a love and stability that is absent from too many homes,’ he told an audience in Washington DC. He spoke shortly after Pope Benedict XVI told the English and Welsh bishops that the effects of the Government’s equality laws represented a ‘violation of the natural law’ and that they imposed ‘unjust limitations on the freedom of religious communities to act in accordance with their beliefs’.
[url=http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-1254417/Gay-equality-laws-threatening-Roman-Catholic-adoption-agency-lead-harm-children-care.html]http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-1254417/Gay-equality-laws-threatening-Roman-Catholic-adoption-agency-lead-harm-children-care.html[/url] I would just like to say that I'm damn sure Catholics are a much greater danger to a child than a gay person is, and also that I want them to go explain to the face of every single child stuck in foster and orphanage care exactly why it is they can't go home with a family that wants to love and take care of them today. And I want them to do that [i]on camera[/i]. I want to hear the words coming out of their mouths while they look at those children without families and lie and lie and lie because they are full of hate and they worship death, and I want it on the fucking record so no one will ever forget what Jesus stands for.

Obviously being gay is a choice same as being bisexual is but the bad choices you make you will pay for them after you are about to die.

edit: might i add that you were banned on march 28th and your account was registered on march 27th (probably already assumed you were getting banned, or wanted to start off on a ‘clean slate’)

Wingman account, no doubt. :P[/quote]why wait one month then?

item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

I know a gay man, honest to god I had no idea he was gay until he actually told me. He also told me that he didn’t choose to be a gay he just naturally doesn’t like women, he doesn’t like being gay and he would change if he /could/ but he can’t.

item.description:
@jme wrote:

repacsenur:

Obviously being gay is a choice same as being bisexual is but the bad choices you make you will pay for them after you are about to die.

Do you have a choice? A choice to like men or women?

I know I don’t. I only like women, and I can’t help that. It seems to me that you must be bi-sexual, seeing as you have a choice. Maybe you should heed your own warning.

item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:135, topic:331353”][quote author=Cain_ link=topic=427709.msg3194554#msg3194554 date=1272656837]

[quote author=xx matty xx link=topic=427709.msg3194548#msg3194548 date=1272656544]

The Pope should be hung or be rotting in prison right now
[/quote]um why?

Ummmmmm maybe because he was instrumental in the hiding of disgusting fucking pedophiles?
[/quote]yes but hanging him or inducing any sort rotting process would be violating his human rights[/quote]

I really don’t care? Do you think human rights are considered by clergy when they rape little boys up the asshole and bust a nut all over their face?

The question Richard Dawkins wants answered is why the church has been allowed to "get away with it."

“Suppose,” he wrote in the Guardian, "the British secretary of state for schools received, from a local education authority, a reliable report of a teacher tying up his pupils and raping them.

“Imagine that, instead of turning the matter over to the police, he had simply moved the offender from school to school, where he repeatedly raped other children.”

item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

I’m glad he’s banned, truly living up to the moparscape stereotype - 502 posts from a person who only posts when his server is down. Might want to work on that uptime.

Oh, and [b][s]your[/s][/b] [i]you're[/i] a fucking retard. No shit faggot means homo. It wasn't being used that way, you idiot.
I think I've seen this amateurish mistake somewhere else before. Am I just being the idiot or does the latter part of that sentence not really make any sense?

Pity he wont be getting them lolz any more… and how sweet he asked me to stop typing, must have got to him.

Read full topic

item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Kozy:

Really? The only reason I’m on mopar now, after leaving RS for a year, is to troll kids. I post on here, just to get lolz, whenever my server goes down.

Thanks for the opening – b&.

item.title: More catholic homophobia
item.dc:creator: @Kozy Kozy
item.description:
@Kozy wrote:

[quote=“Greeny, post:124, topic:331353”][quote author=Kozy link=topic=427709.msg3162921#msg3162921 date=1269737770]
Amg man, Rage on!!11

You act like I really care as to what your saying?

Homosexuals don’t deserve to be treated the same, the same as faggots like you don’t deserve it either.

Now, type out another ~500000000 word essay, so I can not read it and lol at you.
[/quote]

You’re the dumbest kind of person, the kind that thinks that by slandering someone else’s hard work his own poor, miserable uneducated efforts will go unnoticed.

You suck at debating so you launch back with the “I dont care” card, bare in mind you cared enough to reply and have sustained posting in this thread over the past few days. In actual fact you obviously do care - hence the macho attitude. By pointing out you don’t care you really just told us you care, and you let on to the insecurity that you really, really want to be one of the big boys.

Truth is kid, you’re not. You can’t make a smart arse comment unless you’re a smart arse. You’re too fucking stupid. You don’t even have a vocabulary wide enough to insult someone without using words that don’t have the same meaning. Since you’re also probably too dopey to understand what I mean:

[quote]Homosexuals don’t deserve to be treated the same, the same as faggots like you don’t deserve it either.

[/quote]

Faggot means homo. Idiot. If you want to insult someone at least try and stretch your imagination slightly.

I don’t doubt you didn’t read his post, firstly you’re quite a way off on the word count and secondly it contained intellect your track record shows you probably wouldn’t understand. Of course that’s the only real reason you didn’t read it; Not because you wanted to “lol” at it, or couldn’t be bothered. Obviously you have had the time to read it, I imagine it takes awhile to write those purposely replaced exclamation marks with ones to look cool. Not to mention decorating your post with sarcasm.[/quote]

Really? The only reason I’m on mopar now, after leaving RS for a year, is to troll kids. I post on here, just to get lolz, whenever my server goes down.

Oh, and your a fucking retard. No shit faggot means homo. It wasn’t being used that way, you idiot.

Now please, someone else type something.

Read full topic

By pointing out you don’t care you really just told us you care, and you let on to the insecurity that you really, really want to be one of the big boys.

Truth is kid, you’re not. You can’t make a smart arse comment unless you’re a smart arse. You’re too fucking stupid. You don’t even have a vocabulary wide enough to insult someone without using words that don’t have the same meaning. Since you’re also probably too dopey to understand what I mean:

Homosexuals don't deserve to be treated the same, the same as faggots like you don't deserve it either.

Faggot means homo. Idiot. If you want to insult someone at least try and stretch your imagination slightly.

I don’t doubt you didn’t read his post, firstly you’re quite a way off on the word count and secondly it contained intellect your track record shows you probably wouldn’t understand. Of course that’s the only real reason you didn’t read it; Not because you wanted to “lol” at it, or couldn’t be bothered. Obviously you have had the time to read it, I imagine it takes awhile to write those purposely replaced exclamation marks with ones to look cool. Not to mention decorating your post with sarcasm.

item.title: More catholic homophobia
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“Kozy, post:121, topic:331353”][quote author=Cain_ link=topic=427709.msg3162221#msg3162221 date=1269678482]

This country is going down the shitter, I’m moving to England.

ahaha

fuck are you gonna be disappointed

save us the trouble and dont bother

Lol xD. Is England really that bad? According to some of my friends, they like it there. I like America, with all of our freedoms and liberties, but there is some things that hinder it. But, I guess that’s the same with any other country.

@Greeny: I really don’t think my age has anything to do with debating. I can have my own opinions as well as any others, no matter your age. (I’m also ahead for my age, by two years.) I understand what the “Healthcare reform” might* do. (*People sometimes react differently then expected, and there can be changes to it). Also a muslim president is a bad thing, imo. I don’t agree with the Muslim religion, nor do I want to be associated with the likes of them.

But, w/e.
[/quote]Everything you have said this far has been bias with no logical reasoning behind it at all, i stick by my statement that you should come back when you get older.

Nothings wrong with opinions. Smd, kthnxbai.

In my opinion you should have been aborted.

IT’S AN OPINION!1!111!!!1!1!
Kozy, fuck off idiot.

Cry more? Just because your some “badass” who has been around here forever, and use your “almighty logic”, doesn’t make you some fucking god.[/quote]
I think you’ll find that it does.

Read full topic
